column4: I'm having trouble installing GNUpod to my home dir.  I don't have root on this machine and using --prefix=/home/me/Local doesn't work because it still tries to put stuff in /etc/perl
It tries to install some special perl modules to /etc/perl  -- how can I tell it to put them in /home/me/Local/etc/perl?
using the --sysconfdir option in configure doesn't work either
that sounds like an issue for the devs of that app...
